name: Birds' Rebellion
description:
Birds' Rebellion

The penguins´ destiny is on his flippers. The birds´rebellion has started. Join the penguins army and prepare to defend your comrades.

This game has been developed by our Swallow Soft team, which is composed of 4 students (Luis, David, Jesus and Vicente), as a class project. It took us a hard month and a half to create and build it, so we hope you enjoy it.
